name: Curve sUSD Pool
description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This pool contains USDT, DAI, USDC, and sUSD, a synthetic USD-pegged token minted via the Synthetix platform.
